p:
An open-labeled randomised controlled trial was published on 7 May 2020, by Tang et al., to assess the HCQ’s efficacy and safety against COVID-19.
49 The trial involved 150 patients; 75 received HCQ along with standard care groups, while other 75 received standard care only. The probability of negative viral conversion was almost similar in the HCQ (85.4%, 95% CI: 71.8–93.8) and the standard of care group (81.3%, 95% CI: 71.2–89.6). But, adverse events were higher with HCQ than with standard of care (30% versus 8.8%).
